title: Are there different books for physical, organic and inorganic chemistry by NCERT? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: No…There is separate books by NCERT on physical, organic or inorganic chemistry. There is only one book each class 11 and 12. Though, they are in two volumes for both classes. If you looking for separate book each for above mentioned three disciplines then you may have to look for different publication and I’m not sure about that if it is available in market for senior secondary level. HAPPY LEARNING!!
No. There are just 2 books for the ease of handling and keeping. Though first one mostly has physical and inorganic and the second one is mostly organic.
